Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Agama uses nodeJS

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> and nodeJS has thousands of modules that agama needs to run

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> one of those "dependencies" was poisoned

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> so that it recorded information like seed phrases and private keys, allowing the attacker to sweep out funds

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> That is the very high level idea of what happened

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrd-hush] <Berg> If you have already used Agama in the last 2 months with that seed than its "ok" to use it again to move the funds. If you have not used it for more than 4 months then you can leave them just on the seed. We recommend moving all funds (all coins) out. Use this link to see all your assetchain balance https://dexstats.info/assetviewer.php

How to Generate new address quickly?
Use Verus version of Agama which is not affected -  https://veruscoin.io/wallet.html
1. Start VRSC Lite mode
2. create new seed which will generate new address which is compatible with KMD and all assetchain.  Keed the seed safely backedup (make a note of that address)

Alternative method to generate new address
- Use native mode (best to use CLI) - Safest - Use bootstrap from here if you like https://dexstats.info/bootstrap.php
- Use coinbin (may not be most secure as it's web) - https://deckersu.github.io/coinbin/#newAddress

How to send funds to the new address?
Send all KMD and assetchains funds to that address, even if Verus wallet doesn't support that coin at the moment. As long as you have the seed safe, you can access your funds later.
0. If you have Agama 0.3.5 or 0.3.6b, use that to send funds out or
1. Quickest - Agama webwallet ONLY to send funds out immediately https://www.atomicexplorer.com/wallet/#/
2. You can also use this guide to send all KMD and assetchains to new address. You don't need to use 2 computers. Just use one offline computer https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000026631-sign-transactions-offline-and-broadcast-online-using-agama

Where to send funds?
- Another address created by Verus Agama or native mode
- Ledger wallet
- CEX (they are not affected but if you want to)

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <ITM> BTCH offers no benefits? Why was it even created in the first place. All I know I sold out hush before BTCH snapshot.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <ITM> I reentered hush after 2months and both the price of BTCH and Hush was 80% down. lol

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> BTCH was a way to experiment with KMD asset chains, and also try something that hadn't been done before, to my knowledge: airdrop 4 different chains onto a new chain. It was always billed as experimental. It had some things before Hush (like DPoW), but now is behind Hush in terms of technology. It's due for a revival soon, and most likely it will be 50% PoS and 50% PoW. Right now it's just a token that is not mineable. It was not even possible to create mineable asset chains when BTCH was created. Those were dark times @ITM

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> HUSH will always stay 100% PoW and BTCH will be our playground to try out 50/50 stuff, essentially
